sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-form :form="tabGoodsInfo" layout="horizontal" hideRequiredMark>
    <a-row>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="产品编码"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input
            v-if="disabled"
            disabled="disabled"
            v-decorator="['productCode']"
            placeholder="默认带出"
          />
          <template v-else="disabled">getProcessInfo</template>
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="产品分类"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-cascader
            v-if="disabled"
            v-decorator="['productClass']"
            :options="options"
            :fieldNames="{ label: 'name', value: 'id', children: 'childrens' }"
            @change="onChangeGoodsClass"
            placeholder="请输入分类名称"
            changeOnSelect
          />
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="产品名称"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['productName']" placeholder="请输入产品名称"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="规格"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['productSpecifications']" placeholder="请输入规格"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="单位"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['productUnit']" placeholder="请输入单位"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="获取途径"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['productWay']" placeholder="请输入获取途径"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="备注"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-input v-if="disabled" v-decorator="['productRemark']" placeholder="请输入备注"/>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8">
        <a-form-item
          label="产品类别"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-select
            allowClear
            placeholder="请输入产品类别"
            @change="onChangeProductClass"
            @select="onSelectProductClass"
            v-decorator="['productCategory']"
          >
            <a-select-option key="0">弹簧</a-select-option>
            <a-select-option key="1">原材料</a-select-option>
            <a-select-option key="2">普通商品</a-select-option>
          </a-select>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
      <a-col :span="8" v-if="isSpring">
        <a-form-item
          label="弹簧种类"
          :class="{labelColor: isLabelColor}"
          :label-col="labelCol"
          :wrapper-col="wrapperCol"
        >
          <a-select allowClear v-decorator="['productSpringType']" placeholder="请输入弹簧种类">
            <a-select-option v-for="d in springType" :key="d.id">{{ d.name }}</a-select-option>
          </a-select>
          <!-- <template v-else="disabled">{{getProcessInfo.code}}</template> -->
        </a-form-item>
      </a-col>
    </a-row>
  </a-form>
</template>
<script>
import { getGoodsClass } from '../../basic_lib/index'
import { springType } from '../../basic_lib/column'
import { mixinBasic, mixinIsEdit } from '@/components/tools/mixin/mixin'

export default {
  name: 'ProductInfo',
  mixins: [mixinBasic, mixinIsEdit],
  data() {
    return {
      tabGoodsInfo: this.$form.createForm(this),
      options: [],
      springType,
      isSpring: false
    }
  },
  created() {
    // 产品分类
    getGoodsClass.call(this)
  },
  methods: {
    // 产品分类
    onChangeGoodsClass(value) {
      console.log(value)
    },
    // 产品类别
    onChangeProductClass(value) {
      if (value === undefined) {
        this.isSpring = false
        return
      }
      this.isSpring = true
    },
    onSelectProductClass(value) {
      if (value === '0') {
        this.isSpring = true
        return
      }
      this.isSpring = false
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="less" scoped>
</style>
